com.android.snoozealarmfront

Class RemindersDbAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.snoozealarmfront.RemindersDbAdapter

  • public class RemindersDbAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple reminder database access helper class. Defines the basic CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for the example, and gives the ability to list all reminders as well as retrieve or modify a specific reminder.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public RemindersDbAdapter open()
                        throws SQLException
        Open the database. If it cannot be opened, try to create a new instance of the database. If it cannot be created, throw an exception to signal the failure
        Returns:
        this (self reference, allowing this to be chained in an initialization call)
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database could be neither opened or created

      • close

        public void close()

      • createReminder

        public long createReminder(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String body,
                  java.lang.String reminderDateTime)
        Create a new reminder using the title, body and reminder date time provided. If the reminder is successfully created return the new rowId for that reminder, otherwise return a -1 to indicate failure.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the reminder
        body - the body of the reminder
        reminderDateTime - the date and time the reminder should remind the user
        Returns:
        rowId or -1 if failed

      • deleteReminder

        public boolean deleteReminder(long rowId)
        Delete the reminder with the given rowId
        Parameters:
        rowId - id of reminder to delete
        Returns:
        true if deleted, false otherwise

      • fetchAllReminders

        public Cursor fetchAllReminders()
        Return a Cursor over the list of all reminders in the database
        Returns:
        Cursor over all reminders

      • fetchReminder

        public Cursor fetchReminder(long rowId)
                     throws SQLException
        Return a Cursor positioned at the reminder that matches the given rowId
        Parameters:
        rowId - id of reminder to retrieve
        Returns:
        Cursor positioned to matching reminder, if found
        Throws:
        SQLException - if reminder could not be found/retrieved

      • updateReminder

        public boolean updateReminder(long rowId,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String body,
                     java.lang.String reminderDateTime)
        Update the reminder using the details provided. The reminder to be updated is specified using the rowId, and it is altered to use the title, body and reminder date time values passed in
        Parameters:
        rowId - id of reminder to update
        title - value to set reminder title to
        body - value to set reminder body to
        reminderDateTime - value to set the reminder time.
        Returns:
        true if the reminder was successfully updated, false otherwise
